Description_lang: In Horrific Visions, Reduced damage taken and increased damage done by $m0%.Each ally within $m3 yds reduces this amount by $m2%.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage done increased by $m0%, Damage taken reduced by $m0%

description_blz.en_US:
In Horrific Visions, Reduced damage taken and increased damage done by 15%.

Each ally within 100 yds reduces this amount by 3%.
description_blz.es_MX:
En las Visiones horribles, el daño recibido se reduce y el daño infligido aumenta un 15%.

Cada aliado que esté en un radio de 100 m reduce este beneficio un 3%.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Em Visões Horrendas, dano recebido reduzido e dano causado aumentado em 15%.

Cada aliado em um raio de 100 m reduz esse valor em 3%.
description_blz.de_DE:
Verringert in verstörenden Visionen den erlittenen Schaden und erhöht den verursachten Schaden um 15%.

Jeder Verbündete innerhalb von 100 Metern verringert diesen Wert um 3%.
description_blz.en_GB:
In Horrific Visions, Reduced damage taken and increased damage done by 15%.

Each ally within 100 yds reduces this amount by 3%.
description_blz.es_ES:
En las visiones horripilantes, reduce el daño recibido y aumenta el infligido un 15%.

Cada aliado en un radio de 100 m reduce un 3% esta cantidad.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Réduit les dégâts subis et augmente les dégâts infligés de 15 % dans les visions horrifiques.

Chaque personnage allié à moins de 100 m réduit cette valeur de 3 %.
description_blz.it_IT:
Riduce i danni subiti e aumenta i danni inflitti del 15% nelle Visioni Orripilanti.

Ogni alleato entro 100 m riduce quest'ammontare del 3%.
description_blz.ru_RU:
В жутких видениях получаемый урон уменьшается, а наносимый урон увеличивается на 15%.

Ослабевает на 3% за каждого союзника в радиусе 100 м.
description_blz.ko_KR:
공포의 환영에서 받는 피해와 공격력이 15%만큼 감소 및 증가합니다.

100미터 내에 있는 아군 한 명당 효과가 3%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
在恐怖幻象中，受到的傷害降低15%，造成的傷害提高15%。

100碼內的每位盟友都會使此加成降低3%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
在惊魂幻象中，降低受到的伤害并提高造成的伤害，数值均为15%。

100码内每有一个盟友，该数值降低3%。
